packages.name: Extreme Explosive Ensemble
packages.description: The Extreme Explosive Ensemble value pack is the ultimate fireworks collection, featuring an impressive array of reloadable shells, repeaters, and more, designed to deliver a spectacular and unforgettable display.

packages.name: Starlight Symphony Collection
packages.description: The Starlight Symphony Collection value pack offers a dazzling assortment of fireworks, providing a spectacular and varied display perfect for any celebration.

packages.name: Galaxy Burst Bundle
packages.description: The Galaxy Burst Bundle value pack delivers an enchanting array of fireworks, perfect for creating a captivating and memorable display for any occasion.

packages.name: Eruption Spectacular
packages.description: The Eruption Spectacular value pack offers a delightful mix of fireworks, perfect for adding a touch of magic and excitement to any celebration.
